content: अभिसारः {@--1@} Going to meet (as a lover), appointment, assignation; रतिसुखसारे गतमभिसारे मदनमनोहरवेशं <ls>Gīt. 5.</ls> {@--2@} The place where lovers meet by appointment, rendezvous; त्वरितमुपैति न कथमभिसारं <ls>Gīt. 6.</ls> {@--3@} An attack, assault; श्वोऽभिसारः पुरस्य नः <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--4@} War, battle. {@--5@} A follower, companion. {@--6@} Might, power. {@--7@} An instrument. {@--8@} A purificatory rite. {@--9@} (°राः <ab>pl.</ab>) <ab>N.</ab> of a people. --री <ab>N.</ab> of a town.
